entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
